attributes.background: Suspend VAT on fuel during this period of uncertainty.  The price of fuel is constantly rising making it unaffordable for many to use their vehicles. Over half of the price of petrol and diesel is tax, both duty and VAT. By suspending the VAT it will reduce prices to a more affordable level.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/599411
